fields.description:
Hello!
I compiled my app with new Ti SDK 8.0.1 and it is showing a special behaviour when I open a window on android.
Please, would you review the video to explain more clearly? when I am opening a window an effect of fade black is showing all the time.

{color:red}Note{color}: We can't reproduce this issue with 7.5.0.GA

Steps to reproduce:
1. Download attached test project.
2. Build that project with 8.0.1.GA on Android devices.
3. Open then apps and click on Ground 
4. Opening a window an effect of fade black is showing all the time.
5. Now build that project with 7.5.0.GA on Android devices.
6. No effect of fade black

Test devices: Android 8 (Samsung J7)

Test Environment:
{code}
Operating System
  Name                        = Mac OS X
  Version                     = 10.13.6
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 8589934592
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 10.14.1
  npm Version                 = 6.9.0
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.1.1
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 8.0.1.GA
{code}
fields.summary: Android: Opening a windows a effect of fade black is showing  with 8.0.1.GA
